name: Sterio
text:
I love my family.
Papa and Mama, my sibling Canes.
Everyone is precious, I want to be with them forever.

name: Sterio
text:
-And when I told that to our neighbors,
they asked me why I loved them so much.

name: Sterio
text:
A little while ago...
When I was about the same size as Canes,
they told me about how I came to be.

name: Sterio
text:
A different planet from Muiraoka I,
I forgot where...
Apparently, I was abandoned there.

name: Sterio
text:
Then, I was about to be eaten
by other creatures, but
they saved me-

name: Sterio
text:
Papa and Mama just happened to want
someone to be a "hunting dog."
So they made me their son.

name: Sterio
text:
But, when they told me that story,
Papa also said,
"You can choose what you want to do".

name: Sterio
text:
I really should have been wiped
off the face of the earth by now, but Papa and Mama
gave me a place to live, and a family.

name: Sterio
text:
So I said I'd be a "hunting dog".
I thought it would be incredibly happy
to even be given a role.

name: Sterio
text:
After that, Canes and I
studied every day,
ate meals, and went for walks-

name: Sterio
text:
A little while ago, as an apprentice,
I was taken to my first real hunt.

name: Sterio
text:
But, I messed up a little bit
along the way and got separated
from the group with Canes...

name: Sterio
text:
I'm strong and fast.
My nose and ears are the best in the family.
But I don't understand difficult things well.

name: Sterio
text:
When I didn't know what to do,
Canes thought of various things for me
and somehow made it work~!

name: Sterio
text:
He's amazing.
Smart, strong, and kind.
My proud sibling whom I respect!

name: Sterio
text:
So, from now on, I'll always, always
stay by Canes' side and protect
our family and everyone on Muiraoka I!

name: Sterio
text:
...That's why I'm a little worried now.
Canes has been listless lately.
When I ask him why, he says he's "fine".

name: Sterio
text:
And, he suddenly told Papa and Mama
that he "wants to be a hero",
which surprised me a lot.

name: Sterio
text:
My role is to protect everyone.
I'm always by my sibling's side.
My family knows that too.

name: Sterio
text:
So I thought that if I became a hero
with Canes, they would surely
be happy.

But he's still down in the dumps.
I don't know the cause at all.
What should I do...?

name: Canes
text:
Hello, Rokusei-san, [Player]-san.
Please take care of us today too.

options.text: You look a bit down, are you okay?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, is that so?
I don't feel any different from yesterday, or rather, this is my usual level of energy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, as expected, Sterio and I learned our lessons.
It's bad to surprise Rokusei-san every time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're so kind, you worried about this old man?
But don't worry too much, you can be as playful as you want.

name: Rokusei
text:
Now, today I want to introduce you
to the heroes from an agency
called Labor's Site.

name: Rokusei
text:
After yesterday's villain commotion, before we disbanded,
Canes-kun, you asked me a question,
do you remember?

options.text: I think it was about affiliations?
It was about what happens after awakening.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, the question was whether Sterio, who has awakened, can already call himself a hero...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: I think when I asked the venue staff how to become a hero, they said something about joining an agency.

name: Rokusei
text:
That's right, the power of a hero
must be exercised
after formal procedures.

name: Rokusei
text:
For that purpose, in the Earth Sphere,
it's necessary to obtain a license and
belong to a hero agency, but-

name: Rokusei
text:
Well, to put it simply, you're free to choose
where to belong. But in most cases,
people choose an agency that suits their main profession.

Rokusei walks alongside [Player]
towards their destination, but
stops again a little further on.

He had intended to explain while moving, but
he recalls that he had never quite
matched paces with the boys during their previous travels.

name: Rokusei
text:
Actually, agencies specializing in heroes,
like Parallel Flight where [Player] belongs to,
are rare.

name: Rokusei
text:
Others mostly form agencies
in similar industries such as service,
civil servants, athletes, and so on.

name: Rokusei
text:
So, Sterio-kun and Canes-kun, if you
want to work as heroes in the future,
where should you belong to-

name: Rokusei
text:
I called out to a hero from an agency
that seems to fit your profession.
Let's go meet them right away.

name: Sterio
text:
Yes, sir!
...Hmm? I smell something
delicious nearby.

name: Canes
text:
Hey, where are you going, Sterio?
Over here... Everyone is waiting...
Ah, just listen to me!

The moment Rokusei gave the command and
Sterio took a step forward, he swayed
and started walking towards a nearby food stall.

Canes stands in front of his sibling
and puts his entire weight to stop him,
but he is pushed back and carried away.

name: Rokusei
text:
Should we have stopped
to eat something first
, after all...?

Rokusei grumbles,
looking towards the beach area,
which is their destination for today.

Meanwhile, at the actual location, a greeting
was being held by heroes who had participated
from outside Orient City.

Two heroes were on duty at this time,
each exchanging greetings with visitors
and taking commemorative photos upon request.

They were wearing event suits as usual,
but the hero show did not seem to be
underway yet.

name: Goro
text:
Thanks for coming to see an old man like me.
Please go enjoy the other areas too.

After waving to the last visitor,
Goro looks at the other hero.

name: Goro
text:
Oh, it looks like you've also
finished a section.
You seem to be quite popular, Pubraseer~?

name: Pubraseer
text:
I never thought so many people
would call out to me.
The surprise is greater than the joy.

name: Pubraseer
text:
If the venue staff hadn't cut the line,
I wouldn't have had a moment to rest...
I feel bad for the visitors, but it helped.

name: Goro
text:
It's tough to be popular, isn't it?
Come on, let's take a short break now.
Hey, you come here too!

At the place Goro beckoned,
there was a middle-aged man
standing like a guardian deity in his usual hero suit.

As if giving in to the voice repeatedly calling him,
he reluctantly moves his feet and
approaches Goro.

name: Goro
text:
Geez... Genji,
don't make that difficult face
even at such a festive event.

name: Genji
text:
Shut up, I've always had this face.
I told you I wouldn't participate in festivals,
but you brought me a strange request...

name: Pubraseer
text:
Even so, you didn't refuse for the
sake of the citizens' enjoyment, did you?
You're dutiful, Genji.

name: Genji
text:
...I'm just some work, some preparation for emergencies.
Just consider me like a fire extinguisher or evacuation supplies.
I'm not something as grand as a hero.

name: Genji
text:
I'm just waiting for them to appear
at the edge of a frivolous place like this.
Like yesterday.

Genji opens the cooler box
placed at the standby area, takes out
water bottles for everyone, and throws them to each.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Oh, when the monsters appeared the other day,
it's good that the situation was resolved
without much damage to people or buildings.

name: Goro
text:
Planets with a lot of land are nice,
monsters are easy to find, and
we can move around easily.

name: Goro
text:
On Muiraoka IV, at times like this,
a huge one usually comes out of the sea
and causes trouble, you know?

name: Genji
text:
Earth has a sea too.
And even if monster appear on land,
if they attack from the shadows, it's all over for us.

name: Genji
text:
That's why I'm here now.
You guys can just keep messing around
and take care of the customers.

Genji speaks with a grimace.
However, he shows no sign
of leaving the place at all.

Noticing this, Pubraseer
recalls his earlier statements and
mutters, confirming to himself.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah... Genji thinks that
we accepted the request instead of him
because he's bad at events and sales.

name: Pubraseer
text:
So he's trying to take the initiative
to at least handle the venue's security...
Is that it?

name: Goro
text:
That's amazing, Pubraseer...
You've become so good at understanding
his twisted way of speaking!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
I once spent time on a ship with a subordinate
who was not good at communication.
He wasn't as rough as them, though.

Caught off guard and with nothing to say,
Genji pouts and looks away, chugging his water.

name: Goro
text:
Speaking of which,
a hero who has business with us
is apparently coming with a customer.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, I also received a message from the agency.
It seems an "Observer" is
accompanying them.

name: Goro
text:
Just as they say, they're here.
Look over there, speak of the devil...
Hey, those guys are-

Everyone looks at where Goro pointed.
They confirmed that the people who had been told
to them by the agency were approaching.

name: Pubraseer
text:
[Player], it was you after all.
When I heard "Observer" accompanying a hero,
your face was the first to come to mind.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I see, next to you is
the hero you're observing,
and those two are the customers.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Welcome to Hero Festa.
I am Pubraseer, affiliated with
Labor's Site.

name: Rokusei
text:
Thank you for taking your time today
and for the polite greeting!
I'm Rokusei, a rookie hero.

name: Rokusei
text:
These are Canes-kun and Sterio-kun.
They came all the way from outside the Earth Sphere...
Huh, what's wrong, you two?

name: Canes & Sterio
text:
...Eh!?
You were heroes!?

name: Goro
text:
Hey, hey, if it isn't
the rookie hunters from Muiraoka I.
Still looking energetic, huh?

options.text: Well, they're from the same star system, I guess.

name: Goro
text:
You've got the gist. It started when
I built their family's house
in the developing settlement.

name: Goro
text:
Nowadays, some regions
build dwellings with architectural
3D printers, but-

name: Goro
text:
That's a developing territory, isn't it? There's a lot of dust,
and drone construction methods aren't really suitable.
So that's where I come in.

name: Sterio
text:
Goro is a very good person.
When we go to Estevolta as a family,
he always plays with us!

name: Canes
text:
Sometimes we have errands in Estevolta for shopping,
and when we do, we always
go to greet Goro-san.

name: Canes
text:
But when we tried to head to Hero Festa
via Estevolta, he seemed to be out for something,
so we couldn't see him.

name: Goro
text:
Hahahaha, that's right.
Because I went to Earth
before you guys, you know?

name: Goro
text:
Genji, Pubraseer.
These guys are well-behaved,
so treat them kindly too.

After being introduced by Goro, Genji
responds with only "Ouh" and a bow,
while Pubraseer shakes hands with the boys.

name: Genji
text:
...So that means
you're the "Observer."

dialogue_after_selection.name: Genji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I'm Genji.
I hope I don't have to rely on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You know...
At times like this, honestly you should just say "I hope nothing happens", right?

options.text: Thank you for your help today.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Genji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I'm Genji.
I hope I don't have to rely on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You know...
At times like this, honestly you should just say "I hope nothing happens", right?

options.text: This kind of cool person is good too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Genji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Say that to someone else.
I'm not the kind of person who should be admired by a youngster like you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text: He probably meant, "It's an honor to be liked by a young person like you, even though I don't deserve it".

name: Goro
text:
I'm really sorry,
Genji is a very clumsy guy.
He's a good person at heart, so don't mind him.

name: Pubraseer
text:
He especially overthinks things
with "Observers" and civilians,
which makes him blunter than usual...

name: Rokusei
text:
T-this is quite...
He seems like a tough person
when he takes on jobs alone, doesn't he?

name: Genji
text:
.......
Goro, Pubraseer.
I'll shut up now. You two handle the rest.

Genji, unable to bear it, pouts and looks away,
receiving both criticism and support from his companions.

As if such exchanges were commonplace,
Goro ignores him as he leaves the conversation circle
and turns to the boys.

name: Goro
text:
So, what are you two doing
all the way out here?
What about your father and mother?

name: Goro
text:
You guys always travel with your family even to Estevolta,
so a trip just the two of you is unusual, isn't it...

name: Goro
text:
...Huh!
Did you two have a family quarrel!?

name: Canes
text:
We wouldn't come all this way
just because we had a fight!
It's true that a trip with just the two of us is unusual, but...

name: Sterio
text:
Canes and I came to Hero Festa
because we wanted to learn
how to become heroes.

name: Goro
text:
How to become a hero, you say?
Aren't you going to inherit the hunter business?
Tell me more in detail.

name: Goro
text:
...I'm surprised.
I can't believe Sterio
transformed!

name: Goro
text:
And that's why I... or rather,
you wanted to meet the guys
from Labor's Site, huh?

name: Goro
text:
Indeed, just being able to transform
doesn't mean you've "become a hero"
publicly, does it?

name: Pubraseer
text:
At the very least, in planets and countries
where hero is a profession, it is necessary to obtain a license
and belong to an agency.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Regarding hero licenses,
it's better to inquire with a specialized
organization for detailed information.

name: Pubraseer
text:
As for agencies, it would be better to belong
to one rather than establishing your own...
Especially in the case of rookies like Sterio-kun.

name: Goro
text:
Labor's Site is an agency
where people who work in agriculture, forestry,
fisheries, and industry are affiliated.

name: Goro
text:
The agency is on Muiraoka III,
so it's convenient for you
who live in the same star system, isn't it?

name: Canes
text:
There was a hero agency
in the Muiraoka star system.
I didn't know that.

name: Canes
text:
-That's good, Sterio.
Now you can be both a hunter and a hero,
just like Mama said.

name: Canes
text:
If you belong to Labor's Site,
where Goro-san also belongs,
you can work with peace of mind, can't you?

When Canes smiled at him,
he would unconditionally feel happy too.
-Until now, that's how it had been.

His sibling's face he just saw,
and the words he heard from him at the same time,
made Sterio feel as if he was being pushed away.

While denying that it could be true,
to dispel the lingering anxiety,
he asks the other person what's bothering him.

name: Sterio
text:
Yeah, I'm happy that I can do both,
just like Mama said.
But... what about you, Canes?

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, I'll wait until you can
transform to do hero work.
I said we'd do it together.

name: Canes
text:
You don't have to wait for that.
It's a waste of your time.
I probably... won't be able to awaken.

name: Sterio
text:
That's not true! My wish came true,
so you, Canes, who wants to be a hero even more-

Sterio stops speaking mid-sentence.
Because he saw his sibling
stubbornly trying to reject him.

name: Canes
text:
Even if, by some miracle, I could awaken...
I don't want to make you wait that long.

"I wanted my wish to come true too",
the boy's eyes, expressing regret and
resignation, pleaded.

name: Canes
text:
I've had it in my mind all along,
but I can't even hold a candle to you.
My body is small, and my abilities can't catch up.

name: Canes
text:
And yet, Sterio, you "have no choice"
but to assist me as a hunting dog.
Isn't that stifling?

name: Canes
text:
So, you should be free.
Just because we're "siblings",
you don't have to take care of me forever.

name: Canes
text:
You would do well with any skilled hunter.
I'm sure it's the same with hero work too.

name: Canes
text:
...While supporting your activities,
I'll try to find a path that suits me.
So, do your best, Sterio.

Canes smiles sadly and
sends encouragement to his splendid sibling.
Wishing him success from the bottom of his heart-

name: Goro
text:
H-hey... Canes.
Are you really okay with that?

name: Goro
text:
Indeed, becoming a hero
isn't something that can be achieved
solely through one's own efforts, but...

dialogue_after_selection.text: No one, including [Player], would silently watch a boy give up on his future.
[Player] thinks that they can't irresponsibly tell him not to give up, and tries to sympathize with the boy's words.

Encouragement, comfort, reprimand, or something else-
[Player] cannot find the right words to convey to the boy at the moment.

text:
Suddenly, he notices that everyone's gaze
is directed at Sterio. He was trembling,
trying to endure something.

name: Sterio
text:
......
...No.
I don't want that.

As he voices his feelings,
tears that had gathered in Sterio's
eyes fall profusely.

name: Sterio
text:
I never thought it was stifling.
So Canes, why would you say such things?

name: Sterio
text:
I'll always stick to my sibling.
If I lose the role I was given,
I don't want freedom...

Everyone is surprised at the sight of Sterio,
who usually acts cheerfully and energetically
whenever they meet him.

More than anyone, Canes
was greatly bewildered
by his sibling's sadness.

name: Canes
text:
Why... why do you
make that face, Sterio?
Even though I'm the one who wants to cry!

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, your wish, I want to cherish it.
But, but, I absolutely don't want to be
separated from you, Canes...

name: Canes
text:
I don't want this either,
but what else can I do?
You and I live in different places!

name: Sterio
text:
No, no, we do not live in different places!
Without question, my place is always
where Papa, Mama, and you are, Canes!

Sterio had always obeyed his words without question.
Even when he asked for clarification,
he never refused.

But this time, Sterio, like a disobedient child,
just kept saying no, over and over again.

name: Canes
text:
I'm not being selfish and saying this to you.
This choice is also for your good, Sterio.

name: Canes
text:
If the time allows for it, I would also want to
stand on the hunting ground with you,
and become a hero and be active!

As he speaks, his own inadequacy is exposed,
and though he is frustrated by that,
Canes tries to persuade Sterio.

name: Canes
text:
But if that really came true,
how long do you think it would take?
By then, Sterio, you-

Desperate, he stops the words
that were about to escape his lips just in time.

Sterio looks worriedly at Canes,
who has a troubled expression and tries
to suppress his emotions.

name: Canes
text:
-Everyone, I'm sorry,
I'll excuse myself first.
Please take care of Sterio.

He looks down, avoiding eye contact with anyone,
and runs away, escaping the scene.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm going too, [Player].
Pubraseer, Rokusei.
I'll leave Sterio to you for a bit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
Why did Canes say such things?
I don't understand at all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], Rokusei, Pubraseer.
I'm leaving him to you.
I'm going to check on Canes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What happened to him?
Seriously, you two sometimes fight too, huh, I'm surprised.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Now, what should I do-
I have to chase Canes, but taking Sterio with me is...

note:
[This choice will only be available if you picked Option 3]

If you are confused, it's just that it will jump back to the choicer above without Option 3.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm going too, [Player].
Pubraseer, Rokusei.
I'll leave Sterio to you for a bit.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
Why did Canes say such things?
I don't understand at all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Goro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], Rokusei, Pubraseer.
I'm leaving him to you.
I'm going to check on Canes.

note:
The choice above is quite important,
as it will change the entire chapter from here on out.
Sorry for not being able to come up with a more elegant design,
but you'll have to do with this for now.

I said "important", but it mostly only changes
if you can have a choice in certain parts of the story...
